title: It is possible to climb in bronze :)

embed.description: Aidan7787 / Bronze 1 56LP / 211W 184L Win Ratio 53% / Vel'Koz - 40W 24L Win Ratio 63%, Azir - 29W 30L Win Ratio 49%, Anivia - 21W 17L Win Ratio 55%, Ahri - 19W 8L Win Ratio 70%, Kennen - 12W 8L Win Ratio 60%

body: Just thought for all the bronze 5's out there i thought id let you know escaping is possible. I for the last 1.5 years i was b5 till a week ago i just started a new mindset played carry champs and am now 94 lp bronze 1. In this time i carried an intentionally feeding tf Jg and many other players. Good luck in the last month of season 6 guys!!!!
